text: @senatemajldr @LindseyGrahamSC Why don’t you fokus on handling the pandemic, #MoscowMitch? Donald and you are far to busy sugarcoating the coronavirus and shifting blame and focus away from what you have been incapable of handling. Both of you have demonstrated competent incompetence in crisis management.
